attributes.action: Call on PM Theresa May to sack Lord Gardiner of Kimble and Mark Casale
attributes.background: At the lastest inquiry into Breed Specific Legislation they classed dogs in rehoming centres siezed and destroyed for being "of type" as Collateral Damage in upholding current dda sec 1 banned breeds, and as people holding positions within Animal welfare it is totally unacceptable

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about appointments. That includes calling for someone to lose their job.

If you're concerned about a particular policy or decision that's the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament, you could start a petition about that.

If you're concerned about the conduct of a member of the House of Lords you can find out more about the Code of Conduct of the House of Lords her:

http://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/house-of-lords-commissioner-for-standards-/code-of-conduct-for-the-house-of-lords/guide-to-the-code-of-conduct/
